weapon_dagger.name: Dagger
weapon_dagger.description: A small blade, probably made of iron. Keep the sharp end away from your body.

weapon_broadsword.name: Broadsword
weapon_broadsword.description: A heavy sword with a wide blade. Doubles as an oar.

weapon_longsword.name: Longsword
weapon_longsword.description: A long straight sword. Great if close-combat is a little too close for comfort.

weapon_bastard_sword.name: Bastard Sword
weapon_bastard_sword.description: A large sword useable with one or two hands. The illegitimate offspring of a Longsword and a Greatsword.
